answers.answer: Seems like you are moving in the right direction.  I was 1 cm for I don't want to tell you how long.  Okay, since you asked . . . ha ha . . .  I was 1 cm for a full 4 weeks.  Maybe even a bit longer.  I had my baby 10 days after my due date.  I went from 1 cm to 10 in a day.  Ouch!  You seem like you are dilating faster though and with preeclampsia, they would not allow you to go over and may need to make the baby come on command.  I had high blood pressure but it didn't develop into pre eclampsia with my first baby.  That's serious stuff!  So, I would guess you'll have your baby really soon.  good luck
I had my son at 33 weeks. Went in for contractions, they gave me a shot to stop them. Then sent me home. Went into full labor just the next day they couldn't stop it. It happens that fast some times

question: I'm 35w 2 1/2cm 90% effacedMy fFN was positive at 32w , I also have preeclampsia. Ive had the steroid injections for baby already so doctor doesn't want to stop labor anymore..Last week I was 1 1/2cm and 0% effaced , this week I am 2 1/2cm and 90% effaced. I also had an ultrasound and baby is engaged.How long before you were 100% effaced and in active labor ??
title: How long before you went into labor
